Title: Authorizes the mortgagee or lienor of an abandoned multiple dwelling to apply for the appointment of a receiver to bring the building into compliance
Summary: Authorizes the mortgagee or lienor of an abandoned multiple dwelling to apply for the appointment of a receiver to bring the building into compliance.
LawSection: Real Property Actions and Proceedings Law
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the real property actions and proceedings law, in relation to title to an abandoned multiple dwelling in a city, town or village
